compatibility.notes: The Sendmail license is permissive and allows for integration with other software licenses, provided that incompatible licenses are avoided.

key_requirements: Include copyright notices in source and binary redistributions.
Provide a copy of the license with redistributions.
license.name: Sendmail
obligations: Redistributions must qualify as 'freeware' or 'Open Source Software'.
Redistributions must be made at no charge beyond the reasonable cost of materials and delivery.
Redistributions must include a copy of the Source Code or an irrevocable offer to provide it for up to three years.
Redistributions of Source Code must retain copyright notices, license terms, and disclaimers.
Redistributions in binary form must reproduce copyright notices, license terms, and disclaimers in documentation.
The name of Sendmail, Inc. or the University of California cannot be used for endorsement without permission.
Redistributions must comply with conditions imposed by the University of California on certain embedded code.
